metadata.title: Explore media metadata publishing and playback interactions

abstract.text: Learn how you can highlight your app‚Äôs Now Playing information on every platform. doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Create a great video playback experience

abstract.text: Find out how you can use the latest iOS and iPadOS system media players to build amazing media apps. We‚Äôll share how we designed the updated player and give you best practices and tips to help you design media experiences of your own. We‚Äôll also explore Live Text for video and show you how to integrate interstitials and playback speed controls into your apps.
Xcode 14, Swift 5.7, iOS 16, macOS 13 (Ventura), tvOS 16, watchOS 9.
